newsitem.title: USA: NOTICE OF SALE - Bristol, Conn..
newsitem.headline: NOTICE OF SALE - Bristol, Conn..

text.p: SEALED PROPOSALS will be received by the City of Bristol, Connecticut, at People's Bank, Bridgeport Center, 850 Main Street, Bridgeport, Connecticut 06601, until 11:30 A.M. (Eastern Daylight Time) on

for the purchase when issued, at not less than par and accrued interest from the date of the Bonds to the date of delivery, of the whole of $4,260,000 General Obligation Bonds, Issue of 1996, payable on September 1 in each year as follows: $215,000 in each of the years 1997 through 2008, and $210,000 in each of the years 2009 through 2016. The
'', will be certified by State Street Bank and Trust Company of

Connecticut, N.A., Hartford, Connecticut, and delivered against payment in Federal funds in New York, New York, on or about September 12, 1996, subject to the approving opinion of Day, Berry & Howard of Hartford, Connecticut. The Bonds will be issued by means of a book-entry system with The Depository Trust Company, New York, New York, acting as securities depository.
Notices of Sale, Bid Forms and the City's Official Statement may be obtained from Ms. Valerie Arch, at People's Bank, Bridgeport Center, 850 Main Street, Bridgeport,
John A. Letizia, Agent of the Board of Finance
